sentences.en: ‘You can trust me,’ he said. Jane looked sceptical.
sentences.cn: “你可以相信我。”他说。而简看上去一脸怀疑。

sentences.en: A small smile came over Winifred's face, subtle and sceptical.
sentences.cn: 威妮弗莱德的脸上露出了一丝神秘, 怀疑的微笑.

sentences.en: Confucius did not accept the religious ideas of his times , and was sceptical of the supernatural.
sentences.cn: 孔子既不相信当时的宗教观, 也不相信超自然的神力.

sentences.en: Economists, almost to a man, were sceptical.
sentences.cn: 经济学家几乎无一例外地持怀疑态度。

sentences.en: He felt himself too cultured and sceptical.
sentences.cn: 他觉得自己既很有教养,又富于怀疑精神.

sentences.en: He is very sceptical about the value of rote learning.
sentences.cn: 他非常怀疑死记硬背是否有用。

sentences.en: He takes a rather sceptical view of love and romance.
sentences.cn: 他对爱情和浪漫持非常怀疑的态度。

sentences.en: I am rather sceptical about their professed sympathy for the poor.

sentences.en: I am sceptical about his chances of winning.

sentences.en: Miss Ophelia is gay, easy, unpunctual, unpractical, sceptical.

sentences.en: They should be sceptical of exaggerated claims for what such courses can achieve.
